| HistoryText             = The Servitors of the [[Celestial Destructor (Earth-616)|Celestial Destructor]] came in along with their leader, battling the superhuman community assembled to counter him, and were repelled alongside him.{{r|Civil War II Vol 1 1}}{{r|New Avengers Vol 4 12}}

==Powers==
The Servitors were strong enough to fight the joint forces of the Avengers, X-Men, and Inhumans, among others.{{r|Civil War II Vol 1 1}}{{r|New Avengers Vol 4 12}}{{r|Civil War II: Gods of War Vol 1 1}} They were also able to fly.{{r|New Avengers Vol 4 12}}
